query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM island_guides WHERE placeId IS NULL) as orphaned_guides,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM island_guides WHERE placeId IS NOT NULL) as linked_guides,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM places WHERE type = 'island') as total_islands,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM island_guides) as total_guides
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM island_guides WHERE placeId IS NULL) as orphaned_guides,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM island_guides WHERE placeId IS NOT NULL) as linked_guides,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM places WHERE type = 'island') as total_islands,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM island_guides) as total_guides
